GapFillInput.Title: Verbs / adjectives with prepositions
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type a suitable preposition in each gap.

Content.Question:
1. You can’t rely on your sister to help.
2. The problems stem from the fact that we haven’t done our research.
3. We are short of time, so let’s get straight to the point.
4. Everyone seems to be lacking in enthusiasm.
5. The house was completely riddled with termites.
6. I’m a little nervous about my new job, to be honest.
7. That kind of thing doesn’t appeal to my sense of humour.
8. How can you distinguish one from the other?
9. Don’t bother about turning the lights off. I’ll do it.
10. We have all benefitted from the situation.
